    public interface ProjectDAO
extends DAO<ProjectDTO>
    Interface for database action regarding projects

        Retrieve a project from the database
        Parameters:
        dto - In the UserDTO, the id will be used to retrieve the list of projects that the user own
        Returns:

      • loadSavedCanvas

        Canvas loadSavedCanvas(ProjectDTO dto)
                throws FatalException
        Load a canvas previously saved into a .bin file If the .bin file has been deleted or never saved, a new Canvas is created
        Parameters:
        dto - of project concerned
        Returns:
        the Canvas
        Throws:
        FatalException - in case of I/O exception

      • load

        ProjectDTO load(java.io.File selectedArchive,
                ProjectDTO projectDTO,
                UserDTO userDTO)
         throws FatalException,
                BizzException
        Load a project previously exported in a tar.gz
        Parameters:
        selectedArchive - The archive to import
        projectDTO - DTO with the name of the new project once imported
        userDTO - Active user
        Returns:
        the projectDTO of the newly loaded project
        Throws:
        FatalException - in case of I/O Exception or if a project of that name already exists
        BizzException - in case of invalid or empty tar.gz
